title: LF Dynamic Que Partners or Team D5 atm
body:
Wanna climb and got some time to spare. Competitive, (sometimes very competitive). Can shot call but not fully confident just yet. However no stranger to team based play. Weirdly nice team mate.

Roles from best to worst: Support > Top > Marksman > Middle > Jungle

Will take time adjusting to least pref roles. But can do it easily if team is equally driven.

Diamond 5 atm, peaked at D4 promo  to D3. Would prefer players of equal tier or greater. add me plez
